data.title: Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate for Windows
data.meta_description: Download Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate latest version for Windows. Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate latest update: March 25, 2019
data.text:
Key Details of Pinnacle Studio 20 Ultimate

Capture, edit, and archive your video memories.

Last updated on March 25, 2019

There have been 5 updates

Virus scan status:

Clean (it's extremely likely that this software program is clean)

Developer's Description

By Pinnacle Systems

Capture, edit, and archive your video memories.

Edit your way with the power, creativity and control of Pinnacle Studio 20.5 Ultimate video editing software. Get the professional-quality results you want with precision editing on unlimited tracks in 4K, HD and 3D, and sophisticated audio tools. New Motion Tracking lets you add moving text, graphics or a mosaic blur to people or objects. Realize your creative vision with new Stop Motion Animation, new controls for 360 video editing and a 6 angle multi-camera editor. Plus, get 2,000+ effects, titles and transitions, and new high-quality effects from NewBlue. Finished your project? Create polished DVDs with 100+ new menu templates.
